name: The Nightingale Floor
description:
Legends tell of the nightingale floor that chirps when stepped on, preventing anyone from sneaking in undetected. Tonight, you need utmost silence - follow your ninja master closely and you might make it across.

Play with the arrow keys or by swiping on mobile.

Made for the silent Bitsy jam. Created in Bitsy with help from Borksy, various hacks, and some extra code of my own.
